record.name: Message.GApp.WriteError
Caption.ToolBar._openShortcut
record.en: Opens a shortcut file for a new connection.

record.name: Caption.ToolBar._newConnection
record.en: Opens a new connection using TCP (Telnet, SSH).

record.name: Caption.ToolBar._newSerialConnection
record.en: Opens a new connection using a serial port.

record.name: Caption.ToolBar._newCygwinConnection
record.en: Opens a new connection to cygwin shell.

record.name: Caption.ToolBar._newSFUConnection
record.en: Opens a new connection to SFU shell.

record.name: Caption.ToolBar._saveShortcut
record.en: Saves the current connection to a shortcut file.

record.name: Caption.ToolBar._divHorizontalStyle
record.en: Makes the frame style divided horizontally.

record.name: Caption.ToolBar._divVerticalStyle
record.en: Makes the frame style divided vertically.

record.name: Caption.ToolBar._divHorizontal3Style
record.en: Makes the frame style triple-divided horizontally.

record.name: Caption.ToolBar._divVertical3Style
record.en: Makes the frame style triple-divided vertically.

record.name: Caption.ToolBar._newLineOption
record.en: Sets the characters to be transmitted the enter key.

record.name: Caption.ToolBar._lineFeedRule
record.en: Changes line break rule for reception

record.name: Caption.ToolBar._encodingBox
record.en: Changes the character encoding of the current terminal.

record.name: Caption.ToolBar._logSuspend
record.en: Changes whether to save to the log file.

record.name: Caption.ToolBar._commentLog
record.en: Writes arbitrary text to the log.

record.name: Caption.ToolBar._localEcho
record.en: Changes whether the terminal performs local echo.

record.name: Caption.ToolBar._serverInfo
record.en: Shows the statistical information for the connection to host.

record.name: ToolTip.ToolBar._newLineLabel
record.en: Character transmitted by the Enter key

record.name: Message.MacroExec.ExceptionWithoutTraceWindow
record.ja:
マクロの実行中に例外がスローされました。 [{0}]
エラーの詳細を見るにはこのマクロの実行中にトレースウィンドウを 表示するように設定してから、もう一度マクロを実行してください。
record.en:
An exception was thrown while executing the macro. [{0]
To see the detail of the exception, please set the trace window display option of the macro configuration and execute the macro again.

record.name: Form.WelcomeDialog._welcomeMessage
record.en: Welcome to Poderosa!. Poderosa is an open-source terminal emulator that enables you to connect various environment including Telnet, SSH, Serial Ports, Cygwin, and SFU.

record.en: Connect to your local &Cygwin (if cygwin is installed)
